aircraft.value: Hawk Defender - AC-1948-812 at Zone-2 Facility

defect_observed.value: Brake system pressure decay. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control Hydraulics component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

preventive_action.value: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 15/11/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 16/11/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 17/11/2023 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 22/11/2023 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 23/11/2023 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

a) Root Cause Analysis: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control Hydraulics component.
Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

ii. Preventive Action: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin
